ca.mcgill.ecse211.dreamteamrobot.brick1.navigation

Class Navigator

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • ca.mcgill.ecse211.dreamteamrobot.brick1.navigation.Navigator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Navigator
extends java.lang.Thread
    Navigator is a state machine running on a thread. It manages movement of the robot in the horizontal plane, watching for obstacles and driving around them.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread
